title: Ancient Roads (6R49)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While you can spot 3 rangers, the site number of each minion skirmishing a ranger is +2.
Lore:	”'…they go ever more heedlessly, we learn, thinking that the power of their new master is great enough….'”
Rarity:	R
